description: An overview of all nodes within the clusters. Relies on data from kube-state-metrics and node-exporter

targets.expr: topk($Top, sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"idle|iowait|guest.*", container="node-exporter"}[5m])) without (cpu, mode) / count(max(node_cpu_seconds_total) without (mode)) without (cpu))

title: K8S / Nodes
